oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ||kabbo (Jantje) (II)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The gemsbok watches and listens and smells the wind. It runs and is a wild 'wind's thing'. 1) p.929v: the gemsbok sits with his ears turned back listening to the wind blowing behind him, 2) This story is found in Book II-9.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The gemsbok is a wind's thing
